actions.committee: House Committee on Interior and Insular Affairs
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Interior and Insular Affairs.

official_title: A bill to provide for a study of the area which was the site of the 1964-1965 World's Fair in New York and to include appropriate parts of such area in the Gateway National Recreation Area.
short_title: Gateway National Recreational Area Addition Act

summary.text: Gateway National Recreation Area Addition Act - Requires the Secretary of the Interior to undertake a study of the site of the 1964-1965 New York World's Fair to determine the suitability of such area for inclusion in the Gateway National Recreation Area and to report the results of such study to Congress and the President. Includes the area described in such report within the Gateway National Recreation Area.

titles.title: Gateway National Recreational Area Addition Act
A bill to provide for a study of the area which was the site of the 1964-1965 World's Fair in New York and to include appropriate parts of such area in the Gateway National Recreation Area.
